Package de.iss.mv2.client.messaging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProcedureListener<R>
    A listener for events that occur during the execution if a MessageProcedure.
    ProcedureResultListener<R>
    A listener to be notified when a procedure either completes or fails.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientCertificateRequestProcedure
    A
    InboxUpdateProcedure
    A procedure to update the inbox of a mail account.
    InitialProcedure
    A procedure that initially requests the servers certificate.
    LoginProcedure
    A procedure performing the login for a web space.
    MailSendingProcedure
    A procedure that sends a message.
    MessageFetchProcedure
    A procedure to request the mail with by a given identifier.
    MessageProcedure<E extends java.lang.Throwable,R>
    A procedure to execute and manage subsequent server calls.
    MessageQueryProcedure
    A procedure to request a list of available message identifiers.
    ProcedureListenerAdapter<R>
    An adaptor that passes occurring events to the given ProcedureResultListener.
    SwingMessageProcedure<E extends java.lang.Throwable,R>
    A procedure to execute and manage subsequent server calls.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LoginException
    An exception that is thrown to indicate the failure of a login procedure.
    ProcedureException
    An exception that wraps an exception that is thrown during the execution of a procedure.
    RequestException
    An exception that occurs during a server request.
